page.title: 10SURVEY ON LIFE IN THE HOME
page.content: { 100% of the people interveiwed had {these items:}_cooker,iron,hoover, T.V.,radio & a fridge.91%_freezer; 32%_video;40%_computer;11%_micro_ wave.{71% own pets.}Cats were the most popular pet with 28%.If I had a choice of pet I would have a dog. 20% own a dog.{Most people get anno_ {yed if pets come in their garden. 91% own spades;80%_lawnmower; 26% grow veg;I like gardening as well as my mum and dad.{88%_more than 2 hours leisure {a day;}96% have a hobby.I like watching T.V.in my leisure time.The favourite T.V. programme is'Dogtanian & the 3 Muskerhounds.'{Most people {feel that the lady of the house should {do the housework & prepare the meals. 91% of famlies eat together.No_one owns a dishwasher or is vegetarian.The favourite type of cooked meal is roast.
